name: Isaias Sanchez
text:
(Translated by Google) Very slow

(Original)
Muy lentos

name: Dalton
text: Waited over 2 hours to be even talked to by anyone, no one came to talk to us until we were walking out the door in-which point they let us test drive a 2017 Ford Fusion which jerked forward from the moment we got into the car. Very disgusting, unkempt building, full of bugs and displeasing odors, would not ever recommend going here. Would 0/5 if I had the chance.

resp.text: Dalton, we are so sorry for your experience. I would like to talk to you personally. We do not have a 17 Ford Fusion on our lot. Please call 251-937-1500 and ask for Hannah. Thank you.

name: Gregg Heaton
text: The service was excellent.

name: Robert Jackson
text: Great job on my truck excellent service

name: Darren Roth
text: Expedient

name: Mary Weekley
text: Friendly and efficient!

name: Derrick McCree
text: looks like a great place to work, only thing is, I don't live in alabama

name: Lee Thomas
text: The best job I ever had, I would love to work for them again

name: Katrina Ritchie
text: My husband works here it's a great job to provide for his family. He's know as the tattoo man

name: Red Hott
text: I work here and I love working here good people with great work atmosphere!!!

name: Kw Styron
text: Workers are good people

name: Jason Bodiford
text: Nice place to work, so far

name: Rodney Washington
text: Have no idea what they do here

name: Justin Harris
text: I hate this place

name: WAYNE WELLS
text: Awesome builds. These in house Cobra restorations are built with quality precision.

name: wblighting
text: Love my UM Cobra!  Great build quality and the customer service is excellent.

name: Gene Mathis
text: Beautiful cars and good people

name: GLloyd Philpo'tt
text: Cobra Replicar, high quality

name: Guitardude4hire
text: Easy in easy out.. parking at the J ..

name: Caleb Brooks
text: Nice amounts

name: Salvador Gómez López
text:
(Translated by Google) Quite wide to maneuver and they are friendly, the download is very fast

(Original)
Bastante amplio para hacer maniobra y son amables la descarga es muy rapida

name: Antwon Williams
text: Great Job i worked there 2 weeks and loved everyday i worked there.. I went to work on time but my job ended cause of my background.. I feel if its unfair for a person not to have a chance to make good money cause of his or her background.. The people i worked with loved my work skills and attitude i just want another opportunity to work there cause its was fun and you make decent money..

name: Damon Thomas
text: Very great place to visit. Mrs. Barbara in receiving has the best attitude I've experienced delivering at these plants! I wish every shipping and receiving had good hospitality as she!

name: AJ Torres
text: Fastest unloading in Laredo, been in & out offloaded within 45 minutes the few times I've gone.

name: Bill
text: They've been good to me as an employee.

name: Lurrine Brown
text: The only thing I like was the work but one supervisor and particular will set u up for the kill and make you lose your job. My 3 or 3 and half weeks being there was just misery I will never reccomend no one to work there because some of those people are there to bring you down and pick with you for absolutely no reason you don't even have to talk to them just do your job they will try they best hurt you. One supervisor acted as if he had my back but set me up when he got in trouble for not doing his job he told me to write a statement because he gap leader threaten me so I filed a complaint and still I get fired for it. I'm a human being and I deserve to be treated with respect and dignity and I have feelings. I'm not go let no one talk to me crazy nor threaten me you got me so mess up. So I highly recommend that you don't consider this job. Lots of people warn me and I didn't listen so I hope you will.

name: Todd Nichols
text: Not that much room to maneuver in with a tractor trailer. And you have to give them your keys while they unload. I hate that

name: Ginger Stone
text: Because they should appreciate their workers more around christmas time we don't get none of our bonus's that MBUSI gives them to give us they keep it. And tell us that we don't deserve it which is only because most of the plant went union. But the rest of us shouldn't be held accountable for that. Bot fair and not very nice. A job is surposed to support its workers because without us they could not build all the seats for MBUSI that they do everyday😐😔😔😕😞😞👆👆👆👆👆👆

name: Gina Yates
text: Nice employees. Unloaded at docks

name: EDGAR ALFONSO LOPEZ
text: GOOD TRAVEL

name: Charles Kennedy
text: Ok

name: Eden
text: the worst place I've been, all day to be downloaded

name: Bryan Theile
text: quality seats made here!!!  Friendly engineering staff

name: Robert Taylor
text: Pull in the driveway and go to the right for receiving (the gate was open after hours). Go around back and check in next to door 7. I arrived the night before and parked next to the receiving docks. There is plenty of space to park multiple trucks overnight.

name: raju singh
text:
Slow in loading , once start unload you in the hr.
Delivering engine try go to dock 3.
They will give you dock but won’t start load/unload you before 6 . They do open at 5 or maybe early than that . 2-3 trucks can park outside .

name: Timoteo Martinez
text: Really bad place to delivery or pick up a load I was here for 4 hours waiting to be unloaded my appointment was at 7 am got here 6:30 and they start working on my truck 3 hours later and then when they finished unloading me they couldn’t found my bills. I see now why this place looks in bade shape I don’t know how this place keeps up on business whit people like this . honestly every one here seems to do what they one.

name: Rustam Nikolaev
text: Good receiving

name: Ronald Stern
text: Slow slow slow checked in at 7:30 and haven't touched me in hour and half unfriendly people who don't care if you have other stops. They started work at 7 am and on break at at 8:30 will not be back

name: Don Talley
text: Good place to deliver 👍

name: Allroads Transportation
text: Fast unloading. In and out in 20 min. Thanks!

name: Brenda Grant
text: Unload was fast. Also, pickup was fast. No overnight parking, gated facility. One truck can park in drive just before security gate.

name: Shirleyann Gilbreath
text: Hey guys and gals there is a good reason for the speed limit lowered please follow it as someone speed osoandd almost hit my car 🚗.

name: Darryl Thomas Jr
text: Great environment and great training!  Love this place!

name: Josh Kyle
text: GREAT PLACE TO WORK. FAMILY FIRST.

name: James Dixon
text: This place is massive! I work here and love it!

name: Jaclyn Sloan
text: Quick service nice workers

name: Yolanda Martinez
text: VERY NICE.

name: Evita Hunter
text: Great experience

name: Jonathan Lee
text: Great people!!!
